And golden it is! On the first leg, you travel from Lucerne to Alpnachstad by boat. From there, you catch the cogwheel train (steepest one in the world, remember?) up to Mount Pilatus. Once you've seen enough, catch the gondolas back down to Kriens and travel back to Lucerne by bus.
